title: 3D-ordered catalytic nanoarrays interlocked on anion exchange membranes for water electrolysis
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00003J, Paper
Lei Wan, Jing Liu, Dongcheng Lin, Ziang Xu, Yihan Zhen, Maobing Pang, Qin Xu, Baoguo Wang
High-performance membrane electrode assemblies (MEAs) have significant importance for developing anion exchange membrane (AEM) water electrolysis, however, the fabrication of nanostructured MEAs to increase catalyst utilization, maximize three-phase boundaries, enhance...
